comments:
I20050301-1230 plus plug-in export for I20050308-0800

Steps:
1. start to debug
2. select the main thread in the Debug view
3. click "Terminate" button
==> "Drop to Frame" button still enabled
4. click "Drop to Frame" button
==>

at
